name: Majin Bone: Jikan to Kuukan no Majin
overview: Majin Bone: Jikan to Kuukan no Majin (JP) is an arena fighting game based on the Majin Bone anime. The game features all the characters from the series along with two new characters. The game interacts with the card game with a QR Code reader. The characters seem to have unique attacks and can be equipped with different gear. There are hazards in the environment that can be used against enemies.
